mapper.select: SELECT b.board3_no as board3_no, b.board3_title as board3_title, b.board3_content as board3_content, b.board3_regdate as board3_regdate, b.board3_isshow as board3_isshow, b.member_id as member_id, member_name FROM board3 as b INNER JOIN member as m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE b.board3_isshow='Y' AND m.member_type = '수강생' GROUP BY b.board3_regdate ORDER BY b.board3_no DESC;

SELECT b.board3_no as board3_no, b.board3_title as board3_title, b.board3_content as board3_content, b.board3_regdate as board3_regdate, b.board3_isshow as board3_isshow, b.member_id as member_id, member_name FROM board3 as b INNER JOIN member as m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE b.board3_isshow='Y' AND m.member_type in ('강사님', '관리자') GROUP BY b.board3_regdate ORDER BY b.board3_no DESC;
SELECT board3_no, board3_title, board3_content, board3_regdate, board3_isshow, member_id FROM board3 WHERE board3_isshow='Y' ORDER BY board3_no DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT b.board3_no, b.board3_title, b.board3_content, b.board3_regdate, b.board3_isshow, b.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_type FROM board3 AS b JOIN member AS m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE board3_no=#{board3_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board3(board3_title, board3_content, board3_regdate, board3_isshow, member_id) values(#{board3_title},#{board3_content},now(),'Y',#{member_id})
